title: Bandit E-sports Recruiting
body:
Hey guys, BanditHobbs here. Just a quick announcement regarding our current roster. We are on the search for both a top and mid laner with a rank of at least D5+  who wants to step up their game and move into the competitive scene of League. Our organisation is dedicated to helping the players and progressing them to hit that top level of play. We haven't got much built up for the League of Legends side of things but we think this would be a prime time for both us and the players to show everyone what we got. We want to grow both our image and YOU as a player, as much as we can. This growth will be made possible through the means of coaching, funding, and larger sponsors. So, if you're interested in growing as a player and moving up to the big boys leagues, simply comment on this thread or DM our twitter (link below) . 

Trials are expected to be held sometime next week.

Requirements for trial:
-D5+ Solo queue
-18+ years of age
-Top/mid lane (pref) 
|-The ability to train/scrim once a week
-Cooperative personality 
-The drive to better 


Twitter League of Legends: https://twitter.com/BanditLOL1
Bandit general Twitter: https://twitter.com/BanditESC
IGN: Javey Dones

Thank you all #staylawless

P.S I'm not very good at ranting, sorry guys :({{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Hi, I play mid, and fit the requirements. IGN: Skuukzky
